mapper.select: SELECT booking_id AS bookingId, student_id AS studentId, activity_id AS activityId, booked_at AS bookAt, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark FROM bookings WHERE booking_id = #{bookingId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bookings ( student_id, activity_id, booked_at, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark ) VALUES ( #{studentId}, #{activityId}, #{bookAt}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{updateBy}, #{updateTime}, #{remark} )
mapper.update: UPDATE bookings SET student_id = #{studentId}, activity_id = #{activityId}, booked_at = #{bookAt}, update_by = #{updateBy}, update_time = #{updateTime}, remark = #{remark} WHERE booking_id = #{bookingId}
